Women's Day

March 7, 2014

Enjoy this Women's day with your mother, sister and wife. You can share our wonderful applications which are specially designed for them.

Share this application so that they can jot down lot of variety of dishes and can make them at later time. We can bet the dish made by her will be the best and cannot be achievable by any other person in this world. We have made you easy. The application is available in major Indian languages and also in English, German, French, Italian and Spanish. For you to download easily we gave all the available link to you.

The applications have been made available in the following languages.
  • Bengali – Bhog
  • Gujarati – Dhokla
  • Kannada – Paaka Praveenate
  • Hindi - Maharaj
  • Malayalam - Appam
  • Marathi – Pav Bhaji
  • Tamil – Samaiyal Kurippugal
  • Telugu – Vindaloo
  • English, French, Italian, German and Spanish -Gourmet Cuisine
  • Only in English - Simple Chef  
We are expecting you to share this beautiful gifts to all your friend for making them happy. You can leave your valuable comments and any other app ideas if you wish for future.
